---
title: plots and output = "asis"
_quarto:
  tests:
    html:
      ensureHtmlElements:
        - []
        - ["div.cell-output-display"]
      ensureFileRegexMatches:
        - ["<li>.*one.*</li>", "<li>.*two.*</li>", "<li>.*three.*</li>", "<li>.*three.*</li>", "<td.*>Mazda RX4</td>"]
        - ["::: cell-output-display"]
---

Simple plot:

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| output: asis
cat("## Title\n")
cat("\n")
plot(mtcars)
```

Render table:
```{r}
library(kableExtra)
dt <- mtcars[1:5, 1:6]
dt %>%
  kbl() %>%
  kable_styling()
```

`asis_output` with one string:

```{r}
knitr::asis_output("* one\n* two")
```

`asis_output` with two strings:

```{r}
knitr::asis_output(c("* three\n", "* four\n"))
```

`asis_output` with zero strings:
```{r}
knitr::asis_output(character(0))
```
